secText:
Lesson:
1. Define the logarithm function as the inverse of the exponential function. (lesson 1.9)
2. Calculate and plot the points on the logarithmic function providing. (all are same lesson).
3. Discuss the domain and range of the function.

In-class assessment:
1. Have students graph f(x) = log10x. Have them identify the asymptote(s).
